version_description:
Add File Downloader
Add Network stream video play
Support All video formats

-  Add Desktop Sharing feature through real-time streaming technology, you can project the Office Assistant interface to your computer desktop, or use a played Office Assistant through the iOS device, can also support streaming video player to play on. interface supports up to 4 devices at the same time borrowing projection displays.

Is your Office Office Assistant to show shared documents, notes, Tablet best way!

- New document annotation functions
1. support add highlighter handwritten annotations on PDF and Word files, support settings, color settings, the friction of rubber.
2. support PDF file for text highlighter color markers, underline, and strikethrough mark
And handwritten signatures.
3. built-in signature manager.

- As well as some minor issues fixed, thank you for your feedback.

We are working to make the software better and better:-)
Minor bug fixes
Added by establishing a Wi-Fi hotspot sharing screen feature
Supports the iOS 8

1.添加文档查看时候直接删除文档功能
2.添加图片查看时候直接删除单张图片功能
3.全新支持FLAC, APE无损音频格式播放,并支持后台播放
4.修正其他小问题

Fixed document sharing time display 
Fixed  browsing CHM document crash
Fixed minor bugs

1. Fixed many bugs
2. Add the battery power saving reminder
Performance improvements and bug fixes

Supports iPhone 6,iPhone 6 Plus HD HD resolution
And a number of bug fixes

Fixed an issue where the text editor to set the font when will cause  the application to crash
Fixed an issue where the document reader to open the electro-optical pen

Add Rar5 decompression
Add 7-Zip decompression
Add text speech
Optimized file manager

Adjust interface display
Add a background app running time detection

1.Support the new iPad Pro
2.Support 3D Touch Quick Access for iPhone 6S,iPhone 6S Plus
3.Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements
Stability and performance improvements
Stability and performance improvements

!!! New support for iPhone X!!!
!!! New support for iPhone 8 & iPhone 8 Plus!!!
!!! New support for iPad Pro 2nd generation 12.9 inch!!!
!!! New support for iPad Pro 10.5 inch!!!
!!! New support for  iPad 5th generation!!!
!!! New support for  iOS 11!!!

Added support for App login authenticate with facial recognition(iPhone X Face ID)
Added support for iPad document drag & drop function
Various bug fixes and improvements

Minor bug fixes
Add Battery Life tips
Various bug fixes and improvements
Various bug fixes and improvements
